title: Drawing, "Rug Design: Abstract Geometric Forms", 1930–31
medium: Brush and dark brown, cream and terra cotta gouache, graphite on gray wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pencil at lower left: D Inscribed in pencil at upper right: X at center left:(X) Inscribed in pencil at center on verso: /3' x 4 1/2' /13 1/3 Signed in graphite at lower left: D; inscribed at upper right: X; at centerleft: (X); on verso: 6x9 [crossed out]/ 3'x4 1/2' / 13 1/3 [symbol for square]
description: Angled geometric forms and dots within triple rectangular border

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Rug Design: Abstract Geometric Forms", 1930–31.
1930–31. Brush and dark brown, cream and terra cotta gouache, graphite on gray wove paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-45.
